00001 /* 
00002  * jcom.limiter~
00003  * External for Jamoma: lookahead limiter using ttblue

00010 #include "Jamoma.h"
00011 
00012 #define NUM_INPUTS 2
00013 #define NUM_OUTPUTS 2
00014 
00015 // Data Structure for this object
00016 typedef struct _limiter{
00017     t_pxobject          x_obj;                                  // Required by MSP (must be first)
00018     void                        *obex;
00019     tt_limiter          *limiter;
00020     tt_copy                     *copy;
00021     tt_audio_signal     *signal_in[NUM_INPUTS];
00022     tt_audio_signal     *signal_out[NUM_OUTPUTS];
00023     float                       attr_threshold;                 // ATTRIBUTE: threshold in decibels
00024     float                       attr_release;                   // ATTRIBUTE: release time in ms
00025     long                        attr_lookahead;                 // ATTRIBUTE: lookahead time in samples
00026     long                        attr_bypass_dcblocker;
00027     long                        attr_bypass;
00028         long                    attr_mute;
00029     t_symbol            *attr_mode;                             // ATTRIBUTE: mode (linear/exponential)
00030     float                       attr_preamp;                    // ATTRIBUTE: preamp in decibels
00031     float                       attr_postamp;                   // ATTRIBUTE: preamp in decibels  
00032 } t_limiter;
00033 
00034 // Prototypes for methods: need a method for each incoming message type:
00035 void *limiter_new(t_symbol *s, long argc, t_atom *argv);
00036 t_int *limiter_perform(t_int *w);
00037 t_int *limiter_perform2(t_int *w);
00038 void limiter_dsp(t_limiter *x, t_signal **sp, short *count);
00039 void limiter_assist(t_limiter *x, void *b, long msg, long arg, char *dst);
00040 t_max_err limiter_setthreshold(t_limiter *x, void *attr, long argc, t_atom *argv);
00041 t_max_err limiter_setpreamp(t_limiter *x, void *attr, long argc, t_atom *argv);
00042 t_max_err limiter_setpostamp(t_limiter *x, void *attr, long argc, t_atom *argv);
00043 t_max_err limiter_setmode(t_limiter *x, void *attr, long argc, t_atom *argv);
00044 t_max_err limiter_setrelease(t_limiter *x, void *attr, long argc, t_atom *argv);
00045 t_max_err limiter_setlookahead(t_limiter *x, void *attr, long argc, t_atom *argv);
00046 t_max_err limiter_setbypass_limiter(t_limiter *x, void *attr, long argc, t_atom *argv);
00047 t_max_err limiter_setbypass_dcblocker(t_limiter *x, void *attr, long argc, t_atom *argv);
00048 t_max_err limiter_setbypass(t_limiter *x, void *attr, long argc, t_atom *argv);
00049 t_max_err limiter_setmute(t_limiter *x, void *attr, long argc, t_atom *argv);
00050 void limiter_anything(t_limiter *x, t_symbol *msg, long argc, t_atom *argv);
00051 void limiter_clear(t_limiter *x);
00052 void limiter_free(t_limiter *x);
00053 
00054 // Globals
00055 t_class         *limiter_class;                                 // Required. Global pointing to this class
00056 t_symbol        *ps_linear;
00057 t_symbol        *ps_exponential;
00058 t_symbol        *ps_symbol;
00059 t_symbol        *ps_long;
00060 t_symbol        *ps_float32;
00061 t_symbol        *ps_dumpout;

00063 /************************************************************************************/
00064 // Main() Function
00065 
00066 int main(void)                          // main recieves a copy of the Max function macros table
00067 {
00068         long attrflags = 0;
00069         t_class *c;
00070         t_object *attr;
00071         
00072         jamoma_init();
00073         ps_symbol = gensym("symbol");
00074         ps_long = gensym("long");
00075         ps_float32 = gensym("float32");
00076         ps_dumpout = gensym("dumpout");
00077 
00078         // Define our class
00079         c = class_new("jcom.limiter~",(method)limiter_new, (method)limiter_free, (short)sizeof(t_limiter), 
00080                 (method)0L, A_GIMME, 0);
00081         class_obexoffset_set(c, calcoffset(t_limiter, obex));
00082 
00083         // Make methods accessible for our class: 
00084         class_addmethod(c, (method)limiter_dsp,                                 "dsp",                                  A_CANT, 0L);
00085     class_addmethod(c, (method)object_obex_dumpout,             "dumpout",                              A_CANT,0);  
00086     class_addmethod(c, (method)object_obex_quickref,            "quickref",                     A_CANT, 0);
00087     class_addmethod(c, (method)limiter_assist,                          "assist",                               A_CANT, 0L);
00088         class_addmethod(c, (method)limiter_clear,                               "clear",                                0L);
00089         
00090         class_addmethod(c, (method)limiter_setthreshold,                "/threshold",                   A_GIMME, 0);
00091         class_addmethod(c, (method)limiter_setpreamp,                   "/preamp",                              A_GIMME, 0);
00092         class_addmethod(c, (method)limiter_setpostamp,                  "/postamp",                             A_GIMME, 0);
00093         class_addmethod(c, (method)limiter_setrelease,                  "/release",                             A_GIMME, 0);
00094         class_addmethod(c, (method)limiter_setlookahead,                "/lookahead",                   A_GIMME, 0);
00095         class_addmethod(c, (method)limiter_setmode,                             "/mode",                                A_GIMME, 0);
00096         class_addmethod(c, (method)limiter_setbypass_dcblocker, "/dcblocker/bypass",    A_GIMME, 0);
00097         class_addmethod(c, (method)limiter_setmute,                             "/audio/mute",                  A_GIMME, 0);
00098 
00099         class_addmethod(c, (method)limiter_anything,                    "anything",                             A_GIMME, 0);
00100 
00101         // Add attributes to our class:
00102         // ATTRIBUTE: threshold
00103         attr = attr_offset_new("threshold", ps_float32,attrflags,
00104                 (method)0L,(method)limiter_setthreshold,calcoffset(t_limiter, attr_threshold));
00105         class_addattr(c, attr);
00106 
00107         // ATTRIBUTE: preamp
00108         attr = attr_offset_new("preamp", ps_float32,attrflags,
00109                 (method)0L,(method)limiter_setpreamp,calcoffset(t_limiter, attr_preamp));
00110         class_addattr(c, attr);
00111 
00112         // ATTRIBUTE: postamp
00113         attr = attr_offset_new("postamp", ps_float32,attrflags,
00114                 (method)0L,(method)limiter_setpostamp,calcoffset(t_limiter, attr_postamp));
00115         class_addattr(c, attr);
00116 
00117         // ATTRIBUTE: release
00118         attr = attr_offset_new("release", ps_float32,attrflags,
00119                 (method)0L,(method)limiter_setrelease,calcoffset(t_limiter, attr_release));
00120         class_addattr(c, attr);
00121 
00122         // ATTRIBUTE: lookahead
00123         attr = attr_offset_new("lookahead", ps_long,attrflags,
00124                 (method)0L,(method)limiter_setlookahead,calcoffset(t_limiter, attr_lookahead));
00125         class_addattr(c, attr);
00126 
00127         // ATTRIBUTE: mode (linear/exponential)
00128         attr = attr_offset_new("mode", ps_symbol, attrflags,
00129                 (method)0L,(method)limiter_setmode,calcoffset(t_limiter, attr_mode));
00130         class_addattr(c, attr);
00131 
00132         // ATTRIBUTE: bypass_limiter (toggle)
00133         attr = attr_offset_new("bypass_dcblocker", ps_long, attrflags,
00134                 (method)0L, (method)limiter_setbypass_dcblocker, calcoffset(t_limiter, attr_bypass_dcblocker));
00135         class_addattr(c, attr);
00136 
00137         // ATTRIBUTE: bypass_overdrive (toggle)
00138         attr = attr_offset_new("bypass", ps_long, attrflags,
00139                 (method)0L, (method)limiter_setbypass, calcoffset(t_limiter, attr_bypass));
00140         class_addattr(c, attr);
00141 
00142         // ATTRIBUTE: bypass_overdrive (toggle)
00143         attr = attr_offset_new("mute", ps_long, attrflags,
00144                 (method)0L, (method)limiter_setmute, calcoffset(t_limiter, attr_mute));
00145         class_addattr(c, attr);
00146 
00147         // Setup our class to work with MSP
00148         class_dspinit(c);
00149 
00150         // Finalize our class
00151         class_register(CLASS_BOX, c);
00152         limiter_class = c;
00153         
00154         // Init Globals
00155         ps_linear = gensym("linear");
00156         ps_exponential = gensym("exponential");
00157         return 0;
00158 }

00161 /************************************************************************************/
00162 // Object Life
00163 
00164 // Create
00165 void *limiter_new(t_symbol *s, long argc, t_atom *argv)
00166 {
00167         t_limiter *x = (t_limiter *)object_alloc(limiter_class);
00168         short i;
00169         
00170         if(x){
00171                 object_obex_store((void *)x, ps_dumpout, (object *)outlet_new(x,NULL)); // dumpout      
00172                 dsp_setup((t_pxobject *)x, 2);                                                  // Create object with 2 inlets
00173             x->x_obj.z_misc = Z_NO_INPLACE;                                             // ESSENTIAL!                   
00174                 outlet_new((t_object *)x, "signal");                                    // Create signal outlet
00175                 outlet_new((t_object *)x, "signal");                                    // Create signal outlet 
00176 
00177                 tt_audio_base::set_global_sr((int)sys_getsr());                 // Set Tap.Tools global SR...
00178                 tt_audio_base::set_global_vectorsize(sys_getblksize()); // Set Tap.Tools global vector size...
00179 
00180                 x->limiter = new tt_limiter;                                                    // Tap.Tools Blue Objects
00181                 x->copy = new tt_copy;
00182 
00183                 for(i=0; i<NUM_INPUTS; i++)
00184                         x->signal_in[i] = new tt_audio_signal;
00185                 for(i=0; i<NUM_OUTPUTS; i++)
00186                         x->signal_out[i] = new tt_audio_signal;
00187 
00188                 x->attr_threshold = 1.;                                         // Set the defaults before I go loading in values from the attributes
00189             x->attr_release = 1000.;
00190             x->attr_lookahead = 100;
00191             x->attr_mode = ps_exponential;
00192             x->attr_preamp = 1.;
00193             x->attr_postamp = 1.;
00194             x->attr_bypass = 0;
00195                 x->attr_mute = 0;
00196             x->attr_bypass_dcblocker = 0;
00197 
00198                 attr_args_process(x,argc,argv);                         //handle attribute args                                 
00199         }
00200         return (x);                                                                     // Return the pointer
00201 }
00202 
00203 // Destroy
00204 void limiter_free(t_limiter *x)
00205 {
00206         short i;
00207         
00208         dsp_free((t_pxobject *)x);                                      // Always call dsp_free first in this routine
00209         delete x->limiter;
00210         delete x->copy;
00211         for(i=0; i<NUM_INPUTS; i++)
00212                 delete x->signal_in[i];
00213         for(i=0; i<NUM_OUTPUTS; i++)
00214                 delete x->signal_out[i];
00215 }

00217 /************************************************************************************/
00218 // Methods bound to input/inlets
00219 
00220 // Method for Assistance Messages
00221 void limiter_assist(t_limiter *x, void *b, long msg, long arg, char *dst)
00222 {
00223         if(msg==1)                      // Inlet
00224                 strcpy(dst, "(signal) Input, (anything) attributes");
00225         else if(msg==2){        // Outlet
00226                 switch(arg){
00227                         case 0: strcpy(dst, "(signal) output"); break;
00228                         case 1: strcpy(dst, "(signal) output"); break;
00229                         case 2: strcpy(dst, "dumpout"); break;
00230                 }
00231         }
00232 }

00236 void limiter_clear(t_limiter *x)
00237 {
00238         x->limiter->clear();
00239 }

00242 // ATTRIBUTE: Threshold
00243 t_max_err limiter_setthreshold(t_limiter *x, void *attr, long argc, t_atom *argv)
00244 {
00245         x->attr_threshold = atom_getfloat(argv);
00246         x->limiter->set_attr(tt_limiter::k_threshold, x->attr_threshold);
00247         
00248         return MAX_ERR_NONE;
00249         #pragma unused(attr)
00250 }

00325         //post("anything: %s", msg->s_name);

00329 // ATTRIBUTE: Mode
00330 t_max_err limiter_setmode(t_limiter *x, void *attr, long argc, t_atom *argv)
00331 {
00332         t_symbol        *arg;
00333         arg = atom_getsym(argv);
00334 
00335         if(arg == ps_linear){
00336                 x->attr_mode = ps_linear;
00337                 x->limiter->set_attr(tt_limiter::k_mode, tt_limiter::k_mode_linear);
00338         }
00339         else{
00340                 x->attr_mode = ps_exponential;  
00341                 x->limiter->set_attr(tt_limiter::k_mode, tt_limiter::k_mode_exponential);
00342         }
00343 
00344         return MAX_ERR_NONE;
00345         #pragma unused(attr)
00346 }
00347 
00348 
00349 // Perform Method: mono
00350 t_int *limiter_perform(t_int *w)
00351 {
00352         t_limiter *x = (t_limiter *)(w[1]);             
00353         x->signal_in[0]->set_vector((t_float *)(w[2]));
00354         x->signal_out[0]->set_vector((t_float *)(w[3]));
00355         x->signal_in[0]->vectorsize = (int)(w[4]);
00356 
00357         if(x->x_obj.z_disabled || x->attr_mute)
00358                 goto out;
00359 
00360         if(x->attr_bypass == 0)
00361                 x->limiter->dsp_vector_calc(x->signal_in[0], x->signal_out[0]);
00362         else
00363                 x->copy->dsp_vector_calc(x->signal_in[0], x->signal_out[0]);
00364 out:
00365         return (w+5);
00366 }
00367 
00368 
00369 // Perform Method: stereo
00370 t_int *limiter_perform2(t_int *w)
00371 {
00372         t_limiter *x = (t_limiter *)(w[1]);             
00373         x->signal_in[0]->set_vector((t_float *)(w[2]));
00374         x->signal_in[1]->set_vector((t_float *)(w[3]));
00375         x->signal_out[0]->set_vector((t_float *)(w[4]));
00376         x->signal_out[1]->set_vector((t_float *)(w[5]));
00377         x->signal_in[0]->vectorsize = (int)(w[6]);
00378 
00379         if(x->x_obj.z_disabled || x->attr_mute) 
00380                 goto out;
00381         
00382         if(x->attr_bypass == 0)
00383                 x->limiter->dsp_vector_calc(x->signal_in[0], x->signal_in[1], x->signal_out[0], x->signal_out[1]);
00384         else
00385                 x->copy->dsp_vector_calc(x->signal_in[0], x->signal_in[1], x->signal_out[0], x->signal_out[1]);
00386 out:
00387         return (w+7);
00388 }
00389 
00390 
00391 // DSP Method
00392 void limiter_dsp(t_limiter *x, t_signal **sp, short *count)
00393 {
00394         x->limiter->set_sr((int)sp[0]->s_sr);
00395         x->limiter->clear();
00396         
00397         if(count[1])
00398                 dsp_add(limiter_perform2, 6, x, sp[0]->s_vec, sp[1]->s_vec, sp[2]->s_vec, sp[3]->s_vec, sp[0]->s_n);
00399         else
00400                 dsp_add(limiter_perform, 4, x, sp[0]->s_vec, sp[2]->s_vec, sp[0]->s_n);
00401 }
